A new University mobile escort service for women could be operating on campus as early as next January an administration official and chairman of the Mobile Escort Service Committee said PERIOD

James M PERIOD Wagner associate vice president for business operations said the committee met seven times during the summer to review the official proposal for a mobile escort service PERIOD

The official proposal for this operation was drafted last December by The Strategic Study Group on the Status of Women in a recommendation package titled  One of the recommendations states 

The committee comprised of three administrators and three representatives from the Center for Women Students has focused on the extent to which vehicular transport is necessary Wagner said PERIOD

During the summer University President Bryce Jordan requested the department of finance and business operations set up a committee to explore the mobile escort issue PERIOD

 Wagner said PERIOD

In about  days the committee will prepare its final report a recommendati on for the most practical way the University should act on the proposal Wagner said PERIOD

A partwalkingpartmobile system could be one possible solution because a 24hour escort service might be abused and become a free taxi service Wagner said PERIOD

He said he is optimistic that either a partial or full mobile escort program will approved and in service next semester PERIOD

The committees report will be given to Steven Garban senior vice president of finance and operations PERIOD He will present the departments final plan to Jordan PERIOD

Garbans secretary said yesterday he had no comment on the committee or the proposal it is reviewing PERIOD

The idea of implementing a University mobile escort service has been endorsed by the major womens groups on campus PERIOD Beth Stokes codirector of the Undergraduate Student Goverments Department of Womens Concerns said many women are anticipating the existence of the mobile escort service PERIOD

No official cost for this program has been made but  is one estimate that the administration has heard PERIOD Wagner said the cost would probably be more PERIOD
